statements: SELECT * FROM election_results;
SELECT candidate_name, party_affiliation FROM election_results WHERE votes_received > 1000;
SELECT * FROM election_results ORDER BY votes_received DESC;
SELECT candidate_name, party_affiliation, SUM(votes_received) AS total_votes FROM election_results GROUP BY candidate_name, party_affiliation;
SELECT * FROM election_results WHERE party_affiliation = 'Republican' ORDER BY votes_received DESC;
SELECT * FROM election_results ORDER BY votes_received DESC, candidate_name ASC
SELECT candidate_name, party_affiliation FROM election_results WHERE votes_received > 1000
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT party_affiliation) AS party_count FROM election_results
SELECT candidate_name, SUM(votes_received) AS total_votes FROM election_results GROUP BY candidate_name
SELECT * FROM election_results WHERE party_affiliation LIKE '%democrat%'
SELECT * FROM ElectionResults;
SELECT candidate_name, votes_received FROM ElectionResults WHERE votes_received > 1000;
SELECT candidate_name, party_affiliation FROM ElectionCandidates WHERE party_affiliation = 'Democratic';
SELECT * FROM ElectionCandidates ORDER BY candidate_name DESC;
SELECT SUM(votes_received) AS total_votes FROM ElectionResults;
SELECT candidate_name, votes_received FROM ElectionResults WHERE votes_received > 100 ORDER BY votes_received DESC;
SELECT * FROM ElectionCandidates WHERE party_affiliation = 'Democratic' ORDER BY candidate_name;
SELECT candidate_name, SUM(votes_received) AS total_votes FROM ElectionResults GROUP BY candidate_name HAVING SUM(votes_received) > 500;
SELECT election_id, candidate_name, party_affiliation FROM ElectionResults JOIN ElectionCandidates ON ElectionResults.candidate_name = ElectionCandidates.candidate_name;
SELECT MAX(votes_received) AS highest_votes FROM ElectionResults;
SELECT * FROM election_results;
SELECT id, candidate_name, votes FROM election_results WHERE votes > 100;
SELECT candidate_name, votes FROM election_results ORDER BY votes DESC;
SELECT * FROM precincts WHERE location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT candidate_name, party_affiliation FROM candidates;
SELECT * FROM election_results WHERE votes > 1000 ORDER BY candidate_name ASC, precinct_id DESC
SELECT candidate_name, votes FROM election_results WHERE votes < 5000 AND precinct_id = 3
SELECT DISTINCT candidate_name, party_affiliation FROM candidates WHERE party_affiliation IS NOT NULL ORDER BY party_affiliation
SELECT precinct_name, location FROM precincts WHERE location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY precinct_name DESC
SELECT id, candidate_name, votes FROM election_results WHERE precinct_id IN (1,2,3)
SELECT candidate_name, party_affiliation, votes_received FROM ElectionResults;
SELECT * FROM PollingCenters;
SELECT voter_name, age, gender FROM VoterRecords WHERE age > 18;
SELECT official_name, position, contact_number FROM ElectionOfficials ORDER BY position;
SELECT center_id, center_name, location, start_time, end_time FROM PollingCenters WHERE location = 'City Center' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM ElectionResults WHERE party_affiliation = 'Democratic' ORDER BY votes_received DESC;
SELECT candidate_name, votes_received FROM ElectionResults WHERE election_date='2022-11-03';
SELECT voter_name, age, gender FROM VoterRecords WHERE age >= 18 AND gender='Male' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT center_name, location, start_time, end_time FROM PollingCenters WHERE location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY center_name ASC;
SELECT official_name, position FROM ElectionOfficials;
SELECT * FROM ElectionResults;
SELECT candidate_id, votes FROM ElectionResults WHERE election_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT party_affiliation FROM Candidates;
SELECT election_name, election_date FROM Elections WHERE election_id = 2;
SELECT voter_name, voter_age FROM Voters ORDER BY voter_age DESC;
SELECT * FROM ElectionResults;
SELECT candidate_name, party_affiliation FROM Candidates ORDER BY candidate_name DESC;
SELECT party_name, COUNT(candidate_id) AS candidate_count FROM Parties INNER JOIN Candidates ON Parties.party_id = Candidates.party_affiliation GROUP BY party_name;
SELECT election_name, election_date FROM Elections WHERE election_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY election_date ASC;
SELECT voter_name, voter_age FROM Voters WHERE voter_age BETWEEN 18 AND 30 ORDER BY voter_name;
